oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mussel shells as a source of occupation in laying hens
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Karlsson, Malin
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Animal husbandry
Health and welfare
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Can mussel shells serve as a source of occupation in laying hens? A study will be conducted to investigate this further.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Karlsson, Malin (2012) Mussel shells as a source of occupation in laying hens. LEARN newsletter, June 2012 (2), p. 4.
